description: Identifier of the work order these notification preferences apply to.
Application user for whom the notification settings on this work order are defined.
Indicates whether the user should be notified when the work order is created.
Indicates whether the user should be notified when assignment changes occur.
Indicates whether the user should be notified when work-in-progress/status changes.
Indicates whether the user should be notified when the work order is closed.
Indicates whether the user should be notified when a task under the work order is completed.
Indicates whether the user should be notified when required parts for the work order are received.
Indicates notification on a custom event 1 for this work order; likely organization-defined trigger—confirm with SME.
Indicates notification on a custom event 2 for this work order; likely organization-defined trigger—confirm with SME.
Indicates notification on a custom event 3 for this work order; likely organization-defined trigger—confirm with SME.
User who created this notification preference record.
Timestamp when this notification preference record was created.
User who last updated this notification preference record.
Timestamp when this notification preference record was last updated.
Indicates whether the user should be notified when request comments change; likely tied to the service request—confirm with SME.
Indicates whether the user should be notified when request notes change; likely tied to the service request—confirm with SME.
If enabled, send only a single notification per event to avoid repeats; confirm exact behavior with SME.
User-defined text field for additional notes or configuration; usage may vary—confirm with SME.
Indicates whether all watchers should be notified when the work order is created; likely targets subscribed observers—confirm with SME.
Indicates whether watchers should be notified when assignment changes occur.
Indicates whether watchers should be notified when work-in-progress/status changes.
Indicates whether watchers should be notified when a task under the work order is completed.
Indicates whether watchers should be notified when required parts are received.
Indicates whether watchers should be notified when the work order is closed.
Indicates watcher notification on custom event 1; likely organization-defined—confirm with SME.
Indicates watcher notification on custom event 2; likely organization-defined—confirm with SME.
Indicates watcher notification on custom event 3; likely organization-defined—confirm with SME.
